title: Spotify launches AI playlist for premium users
description: Spotify on Thursday rolled out “prompted playlist,” an artificial intelligence-powered feature in the United States and Canada that allows premium users tailor playlists using their listening habits and commands.
content:

title: South Korea's stock market breaks 5,000 for first time powered by AI
description: South Korea's benchmark index, the KOSPI, marked a milestone after it went beyond the 5,000 level for the first time. It pared back gains to end the session just below that level, but that was still a new record close for the benchmark. The rally was largely fueled by the global artificial intelligence boom, and strong

title: Davos 2026: AI is changing who becomes an entrepreneur, experts say
description: Artificial intelligence is changing how people start businesses and approach careers. Job insecurity and new AI tools are pushing individuals towards entrepreneurship. Platforms show a significant rise in people identifying as founders. Governments are working to make risk-taking more survivable.

title: Orlando Bravo Sees VC Firms ‘Piling Into Any AI Story They Can’
description: Valuations for artificial intelligence startups have soared to astronomical levels, fueled by venture capital firms’ fear of missing out on the next big deal, billionaire private equity executive Orlando Bravo said.
content:
Valuations for artificial intelligence startups have soared to astronomical levels, fueled by venture capital firms’ fear of missing out on the next big deal, billionaire private equity executive Orlando Bravo said.

title: Bessent Urged by Warren to Probe ‘Opaque’ Data Center Financings
description: US Senator Elizabeth Warren and three other Senate Democrats are asking Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent to launch a probe into large debt packages supporting artificial intelligence and the risks they pose to the financial system.

title: Jobless Boom: AI Drives Economic Growth Amid Employment Stagnation
description: The U.S. job market sees minimal new hires despite steady economic growth driven by advances in artificial intelligence. Unemployment claims slightly rose, indicating persistent job scarcity. The GDP grew at an impressive 4.4% rate in Q3, mainly due to consumer spending and business investments, though middle-class families face economic uncertainty.
content: The U.S. job market continues to struggle with job scarcity, as reported by the Labor Department, underscoring a 'low-hiring, low-firing' environment. Despite this, recent data indicates steady economic growth driven primarily by consumer spending an... [646 chars]

title: Report: Apple's New AI Strategy Firms Up Under Craig Federighi
description: Apple has restructured its artificial intelligence strategy under software chief Craig Federighi, accelerating plans to overhaul Siri by relying on external AI models after years of internal delays and organizational friction. According to a detailed report from The Information, Apple's approach to artificial intelligence has undergone a significant shift over the past year.
content:

title: powered 5G, backs Bharat 6G initiative
description: At a time when global conversations around artificial intelligence are increasingly centred on returns on investment and real-world adoption, advanced connectivity will be critical to unlocking AI’s full potential, according to Erik Ekudden, Senior Vice President and Chief Technology Officer of Ericsson.
